Author: somiserablymiserable
Text: Yea, my problem is that I don’t tend to get full enough unless I eat high volume.. regardless of the calories/ protein/ fat so I do end up bloated  I’m just going to try to stop bingeing at night and hopefully that will give the food more time to digest and I won’t end up so bloated

Author: PhoneWalletSanity
Text: I'm by no means a nutritionist/scientist but from purely anecdotal evidence, a couple things cause bloat; carbs, salt and volume.   So if you eat low volume, not super salty but calorie dense foods (think peanut butter) foods to get to maintenance, your stomach won't be too bloated.   Don't put off recovering!
